item.title: On-premise Finance Processing API | Aspose.Finance for .NET
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Finance to Process supported Formats Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.Diagram and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes PM> Install-Package Aspose.Finance   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Exporter for PowerPoint | Aspose.Slides for JasperReports
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Slides to Export JasperReports® to Presentation Formats Aspose.Slides for JasperReports is a lightweight extension that helps you export reports from JasperReports® and JasperServer® to Microsoft PowerPoint® and other supported file formats. Release Notes Download Product Page | Docs | API Reference | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA Presentation JasperReports® Integration Features Export reports to PPT, PPTX, HTML, and PDF formats.

item.title: Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.pub-for-.net-23.6-(dlls-only)
item.description: Aspose.PUB for .NET 23.6 (DLLs only) Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 145.72MB Date Added: 17/6/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/pub/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-pub-for-net-23-6-release-notes/ DescriptionThis ZIP file contains only the Aspose.PUB for .NET assemblies. The assemblies are the same as in the MSI installer of the product of the same version. Download this if you want to use Aspose.PUB without the MSI installer, i.
